text: Overcrowded bus stop especially peak hours in the evening. Thanks to the new residential Clementi North Arc along Clementi Ave 6. We donâ€™t need 8-10millions population. Six million is already suffocating.
Super crowded venue, LTA need to relook the infrastructure again, is different level of crowd compare to 5 years ago! A lot of buses can be choked in the rear during peak hours during evening!
Do not use google maps for the bus here. Will reroute you to other nearby stations in a horribly inefficient manner. Bus stop itself is fine.

Review: January 2022
Bus stop should be properly named as its at the Clementi Mall side
LTA poor performance in the naming of the bus stop & that confusion is only ascertain by walking all the way to this signage.
